tooltip.ImportProfile: Import a profile from the clipboard
tooltip.DragAndSlide: You can drag and slide icons to re-arrange them inside this hotbar
tooltip.SwapToAboveCondition:
Swap Condition Set with the one above.
Also changes the selected sets on the profile who uses both of them.
tooltip.SwapToBelowCondition:
Swap Condition Set with the one below.
Also changes the selected sets on the profile who uses both of them.
tooltip.ConditionSetTutorial:
Condition Set to check. Will load this profile when the condition set is set to true.
Leave this empty if you do not wish to load this profile automatically.
Warning: Profile ordering matters: Profiles with an higher id will be higher in the priority list.
notify.ProfileExported: Profile exported and copied to the clipboard: {0}
notify.ConditionSetExported: Condition Set exported and copied to the clipboard: {0}
cond.Delete: Right click to delete this condition
